Module applications
Package applications.console_application

Class MetroStationWithStreams

java.lang.Object
applications.console_application.AbstractMetroStation
applications.console_application.MetroStationWithCollection
applications.console_application.MetroStationWithList
applications.console_application.MetroStationWithStreams
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetroStationWithFiles
public class MetroStationWithStreams extends MetroStationWithList
Represents Metro Station data with a list of Hours. Stream API tools are used to process sequences of elements. This class is inherited from the MetroStationWithList.

  • Constructor Summary

    MetroStationWithStreams(String name, int opened, List<Hour> hours)
    The constructor initialises the Metro Station object with the specified values with name, opened year and operating hours.

      Overrides:

      Returns:

      Overrides:
      findHoursWithMaxWordCountOfComment in class AbstractMetroStation
      Returns:
